name: Crocodile
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Baroque Works
effect: [On Play] Up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 9 or less cannot attack until the end of your opponent's next End Phase. Then, if your opponent has a Character with a cost of 0 or with a cost of 8 or more, draw 1 card. [On K.O.] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Play this Character card from your trash.
